mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM db_fitness.notice where 1 = 1
and NOTICE_TITLE like CONCAT(#{words}, '%')
and NOTICE_CONTENTS like CONCAT(#{words}, '%')
and ID like CONCAT(#{words}, '%')
limit #{pageBegin}, #{pageScale} ;
mapper.insert: insert into db_fitness.notice (NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, ID, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_VIEWS, NOTICE_CONTENTS) values (#{NOTICE_ID}, #{NOTICE_TITLE}, #{ID}, now(), #{NOTICE_VIEWS}, #{NOTICE_CONTENTS})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM db_fitness.notice where 1 = 1
and NOTICE_TITLE like CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
and NOTICE_CONTENTS like CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
and ID like CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
;
